instruction: Generate the lyrics using given parameters.
input: Love song. Genre - Pop. Title - "An Eternal Flame".
output:
Verse 1:
My heart is aching, longing for more
I can feel a deep connection I had before
Though I know it can't stay, it still burns
But it's an eternal flame

Chorus:
An eternal flame, it won't die out
Like a raging fire, it's burning brighter
It fills my soul and I will never let go
An eternal flame, burning in my heart

Verse 2:
Lost in a moment I can't control
This heart of mine, it's taken its toll
An urge to keep holding on
Cause it's an eternal flame

Chorus:
An eternal flame, it won't die out
Like a raging fire, it's burning brighter
It fills my soul and I will never let go
An eternal flame, burning in my heart

Bridge:
It's hard, it's strong, will never be gone
It's here, now and forever, I won't be alone

Outtro:
Burning, alive in my heart
An eternal flame, it won't go away.
